resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107753</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107753</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087574</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">eLearning Africa 2007: Building Infrastructures and Capacities</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eLearning Afrika 2007: 
Gebäude-Infrastrukturer und Kapazitäten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Afrique eLearning 2007 : Infrastructures 
et capacités de bâtiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">África eLearning 2007: Infrastructures e 
capacidades do edifício</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'Africa eLearning 2007: Infrastrutture e 
capienza della costruzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">eLearning Αφρική 2007: Υποδομές και 
ικανότητες οικοδόμησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">África eLearning 2007: Infraestructuras y 
capacidades del edificio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Meeting the networking needs of the Pan-African eLearning and distance education sector, the annual eLearning Africa conference is the key networking venue for practitioners and professionals from Africa and all over the world.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">Africa</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Vernetzung Bedürfnisse des 
Wanne-Afrikanischen ELearning und Abstand Ausbildung Sektors 
erfüllend, ist die jährliche eLearning Afrika Konferenz der 
Schlüsselvernetzung Schauplatz für Praktiker und Fachleute von 
Afrika und auf der ganzen Erde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Satisfaisant les besoins de gestion de réseau du 
secteur Casserole-Africain d'éducation eLearning et de distance, la 
conférence eLearning annuelle de l'Afrique est le rendez-vous 
principal de gestion de réseau pour des praticiens et des 
professionnels d'Afrique et partout dans le monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando-se com as necessidades do networking 
do setor Bandeja-Africano da instrução eLearning e de distância, a 
conferência eLearning anual de África é o venue chave do networking
para practitioners e profissionais de África e toda sobre o mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soddisfacendo le esigenze della rete del settore 
Vaschetta-Africano di formazione di distanza ed eLearning, il 
congresso eLearning annuale dell'Africa è la sede della riunione 
chiave della rete per i professionisti ed i professionisti dall'Africa
e dappertutto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ικανοποιώντας τις ανάγκες δικτύωσης του παναφρικανικού
τομέα του eLearning και εξ αποστάσεως εκπαίδευσης, η ετήσια 
διάσκεψη eLearning Αφρική είναι ο βασικός τόπος συναντήσεως 
δικτύωσης για τους επαγγελματίες και τους επαγγελματίες από την 
Αφρική και σε όλο τον κόσμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resolviendo las necesidades del establecimiento de
una red del sector Cacerola-Africano de la educación el eLearning y 
de la distancia, la conferencia eLearning anual de África es el lugar
dominante del establecimiento de una red para los médicos y los 
profesionales de África y todo sobre el mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087574</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107753</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/elearning-africa-2007</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
